DOC.detailed_description: Gestational diabetes mellitus ( GDM ) define abnormal glucose tolerance detect first time pregnancy . GDM well-known risk factor develop overt diabetes later life , especially type 2 diabetes . About 50-60 % woman prior GDM develop type 2 diabetes lifetime . Recent study show woman previous GDM exhibit markedly increase prevalence metabolic syndrome , even glucose tolerance normal . For maternal future offspring , woman prior GDM need safe , efficient , acceptable choice contraceptive method enhance already substantial risk develop either overt diabetes metabolic syndrome associate sequela . The intrauterine device ( IUD ) effective reversible contraceptive method without metabolic disturbance therefore ideal contraceptive woman prior GDM . Progestins increase globulin production ; thus , increase coagulation factor blood pressure . A nonrandomized open-label prospective trial healthy obese , reproductive-age woman California study metabolic effect progestin-only long-acting reversible contraception levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system ( LNG-IUS ) etonogestrel implant ( ENG-I ) ] compare nonhormonal contraception ( NHC ) . The change fast glucose insulin sensitivity see among obese 3 month .
